item.title: What needs to be installed
item.description: On the robot Reachy 2021 is already fully compatible with the teleoperation application. You do not have to install anything else on it. On the Windows computer Make sure your PC answers the minimum requirements. SteamVR: You have to install SteamVR. To do so, install Steam on your computer if it isnâ€™t already installed. It can be installed following this link: https://store.steampowered.com/about/. Then from Steam, install SteamVR. Teleoperation application: Install the teleoperation application.
